title: Repeatedly maximizing gzclient window in Unity 3D causes title bar to disappear

content.raw:
Cycling the Gazebo application window between the maximized and unmaximized states can only be done a finite number of times. By varying whether I click on the little button with a rectangle symbol in the upper left or double clicking on the window title bar, I can do it between 1 and 3 times before the title bar disappears (see screenshots).

I've tested this on revision 3995 in the default branch.
